name: sdks/azure/Speech recognizer (from WAV file input)

9614de70-be21-4b26-914b-626411d10007.name: WAV file path
9614de70-be21-4b26-914b-626411d10007.description:
Receives the path to the file containing the speech sample in WAV (PCM) format.

e.g.: "/Users/user1/AzureSpeech/samples/speech.wav"

d94b7b8b-2033-49d6-a041-782ba7f57ba0.name: params
d94b7b8b-2033-49d6-a041-782ba7f57ba0.description:
Receives generic parameters for Azure speech to text services,including credentials.

The key and region values are available from Azure dashboard.

example:
{
  "subscriptionKey": "1e***f",
  "region": "eastus2",
  "language": "en-GB"
}

c16a4c44-3931-48f0-b7d2-9306fb03dea1.type: {optional "duration": number, optional "errorDetails": string, optional "language": string, optional "languageDetectionConfidence": string, optional "offset": number, optional "properties": {string: any}, optional "reason": number, optional "resultId": string, optional "speakerId": string, optional "text": string}
c16a4c44-3931-48f0-b7d2-9306fb03dea1.name: result
c16a4c44-3931-48f0-b7d2-9306fb03dea1.description: Sends the result of the speech recognition.

77ed0548-616e-453a-8531-78d6bbddc486.name: error
77ed0548-616e-453a-8531-78d6bbddc486.description: Sends any error that might have occurred during the API call.

description: Extracts text from speech recording supplied as a WAV file on the local filesystem.
